levels.description: Range <@ba.vup>expands</>; Damage type changes to Arts Damage; Each attack deals an additional <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> of ATK as Arts damage to all enemies blocked by friendly Operators in the surrounding 8 tiles (this damage is treated as a melee attack)
